'use client'; import React, { useLayoutEffect } from 'react'; import { gsap } from 'gsap'; function Slider() { useLayoutEffect(() => { const tl = gsap.timeline(); tl.fromTo('.header', { y: 200 }, { y: 0 }, '+=2.5'); tl.fromTo( '.header .container', { opacity: 0, translateY: 40 }, { opacity: 1, translateY: 0 }, '-=0' ); // Cleanup function return () => tl.kill(); }, []); return (
Design , Development

Network of wormholes colonies extraordinary claims require.

Author
UiCamp
Published
August 6, 2021
02 Comments
); } export default Slider;
